name: LambdaTest
description: List of LambdaTest dashboards to analyse your testing behavior and find error trends.

children.name: LambdaTest - Test Error Overview
children.description: This dashboard shows overview of test error execution details.
children.title: LambdaTest - Test Error Overview

queries.queryString:
$$logsrc 
| where !isNull(test_id) AND !isBlank(error_type) and test_name matches "{{Test_Name}}" and build_name matches "{{Build_Name}}"
| timeslice {{Timeslice}}
| count by error_type,_timeslice
| transpose row _timeslice column error_type

$$logsrc 
| where !isNull(test_id) and !isBlank(error_message) and test_name matches "{{Test_Name}}" and build_name matches "{{Build_Name}}" | count by error_message | sort by _count

$$logsrc 
| where !isNull(test_id) and !isBlank(error_message) and test_name matches "{{Test_Name}}" and build_name matches "{{Build_Name}}" | error_message as Error_Message | count as Total_Errors by Error_Message | sort by Total_Errors desc

$$logsrc 
| where !isNull(test_id) AND !isNull(status) and test_name matches "{{Test_Name}}" and build_name matches "{{Build_Name}}" 
| if (status in ("Lambda Error", "Queue_Timeout", "Idle_Timeout"), "Failed", "Success") as final_status
| timeslice {{Timeslice}}
| count by final_status,_timeslice
| transpose row _timeslice column final_status

$$logsrc 
| where status = "Idle_Timeout" AND !isNull(test_id) and test_name matches "{{Test_Name}}" and build_name matches "{{Build_Name}}" | timeslice 10m | count by _timeslice | sort _timeslice asc

$$logsrc 
| where status = "Queue_Timeout" AND !isNull(test_id)  and test_name matches "{{Test_Name}}" and build_name matches "{{Build_Name}}" | timeslice 10m | count by _timeslice | sort _timeslice asc

$$logsrc 
| where status = "Lambda Error" AND !isNull(test_id)  and test_name matches "{{Test_Name}}" and build_name matches "{{Build_Name}}" | timeslice 10m | count by _timeslice | sort _timeslice asc

$$logsrc 
| where status in ("Lambda Error", "Queue_timeout", "Idle_timeout") and !isNull(test_id) and test_name matches "{{Test_Name}}" and build_name matches "{{Build_Name}}"
| timeslice 10m | count by _timeslice | sort _timeslice asc

$$logsrc 
| where status in ("Idle_Timeout", "Queue_Timeout", "Lambda Error") and test_name matches "{{Test_Name}}" and build_name matches "{{Build_Name}}" | timeslice 1h | count by test_name, _timeslice | transpose row _timeslice column test_name

$$logsrc 
| where test_name matches "{{Test_Name}}" and build_name matches "{{Build_Name}}" | if (status in ("Idle_Timeout", "Queue_Timeout", "Lambda Error"),1,0) as is_failed | count by test_name, is_failed | count by test_name | where _count > 1 | limit 10 | fields test_name

children.name: LambdaTest - Test Overview
children.description: This dashboard shows overview of test execution details.
children.title: LambdaTest - Test Overview

queries.queryString:
$$logsrc 
| where status in ("Lambda Error","Queue_timeout","Idle_timeout")
| where !isNull(test_id) and test_name matches "{{Test_Name}}" and build_name matches "{{Build_Name}}"
| timeslice 10m | count by _timeslice | sort _timeslice asc

$$logsrc 
| where !isNull(test_id) and !isBlank(test_env_browser) and test_name matches "{{Test_Name}}" and build_name matches "{{Build_Name}}" | count by test_env_browser | sort by _count

$$logsrc 
| where !isNull(test_id) and !isBlank(test_env_os) and test_name matches "{{Test_Name}}" and build_name matches "{{Build_Name}}" | count by test_env_os | sort by _count

$$logsrc 
| where !isNull(test_id) and test_name matches "{{Test_Name}}" and build_name matches "{{Build_Name}}" | timeslice 10m | count by _timeslice | sort _timeslice asc

$$logsrc 
| where status = "Failed" AND !isNull(test_id) and test_name matches "{{Test_Name}}" and build_name matches "{{Build_Name}}" | timeslice 10m | count by _timeslice | sort _timeslice asc

$$logsrc 
| where status = "Completed" AND !isNull(test_id) and test_name matches "{{Test_Name}}" and build_name matches "{{Build_Name}}" | timeslice 10m | count by _timeslice | sort _timeslice asc

$$logsrc 
| where status = "Passed" AND !isNull(test_id) and test_name matches "{{Test_Name}}" and build_name matches "{{Build_Name}}" | timeslice 10m | count by _timeslice | sort _timeslice asc

$$logsrc 
| where !isNull(test_id) and !isBlank(test_env_browser) and test_name matches "{{Test_Name}}" and build_name matches "{{Build_Name}}" | test_env_browser as Test_Browser | count as Total_Tests by Test_Browser | sort by Total_Tests desc

$$logsrc 
| where !isNull(test_id) and !isBlank(test_env_os) and test_name matches "{{Test_Name}}" and build_name matches "{{Build_Name}}" | test_env_os as Test_OS | count as Total_Tests by Test_OS | sort by Total_Tests desc

$$logsrc 
| timeslice {{Timeslice}} | where !isNull(test_id) AND !isNull(test_started_at) AND !isNull(test_ended_at) and test_name matches "{{Test_Name}}" and build_name matches "{{Build_Name}}"
// Convert the two fields defining the start and end of each test to milliseconds
| count as Test_Execution_Count by _timeslice
| sort by _timeslice asc
| fillmissing timeslice({{Timeslice}})
| compare with timeshift {{Timeshift}}
